thread.title: Dawn Matthieu
thread.title_full: Carousel Checks reviewed by Dawn Matthieu

author: Dawn Matthieu
title: Dawn Matthieu
text: I've used Carousel in the past and when I moved to a new state, I found myself in need of updated checks. As usual, the website was easy to navigate and checkout was simple. I didn't look far enough down the page to see the free shipping that was advertised but ordered my checks anyway. I called customer service to ask about the free shipping and my request was handled quickly and without any pain. The order corrected (my mistake) and the credit immediate. Couldn't be happier.
